mapper.sql: id, product_code, product_type, product_name, issue_amount, product_deadline, plan_annual_yield, raise_start_date, raise_end_date, start_bid_amount, increment_amount, extend_deadline, value_date, expiring_date, extend_expiring_date, nterest_mode, contract_template, plan_cash_day, interest_penalty_rate, status, settle_amount, product_desc, project_detail, refund_source, repayment_amount, factraise_time, factknot_time, repayment_time, create_time, modify_time, del_flag, ext, new_or_old_type, contract_url, continue_status, continue_amount, push_party_id, bill_type, bill_type_name
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( -- 票据资产 SELECT a2.assets_adoption_rate AS creditor_rights_transfer_cost, -- 平台采购成本 NULL AS contract_num, -- 原始资产合同编号 NULL AS debtor_cus_num, -- 债务人客户编号 NULL AS original_debtor, -- 原始债务人 p2.new_or_old_type, -- 新/旧 t2.push_party_org_code AS push_party_code, -- 推送方编码 NULL AS remark, -- 备注 p2.product_deadline, -- 产品期限 p2.value_date, -- 产品起息日 p2.raise_start_date, -- 募集开始时间 p2.raise_end_date, -- 募集结束时间 p2.settle_amount, -- 结标金额 p2.issue_amount, -- 发标金额 p2.refund_source, -- 还款来源1其他2债务人还款 p2.repayment_time, -- 实际还款时间 p2.expiring_date, -- 产品到期日 a2.assets_interest, -- 资产利息 p2.plan_annual_yield, -- 产品年化收益率 a2.bill_remaining_days, -- 资产期限 a2.bill_rate_due_date, -- 资产计息到期日 a2.passive_id, -- 被替票ID p2.status, -- 产品状态 p2.create_time, p2.product_code, -- 产品编码 p2.product_type, -- 产品类型 p2.product_name, -- 产品名 p2.id, a2.assets_code, -- 资产编码 a2.`status` as asset_status, -- 资产状态 p2.factknot_time -- 实际结标时间 FROM ( SELECT p1.new_or_old_type, p1.product_deadline, p1.value_date, p1.raise_start_date, p1.raise_end_date, p1.settle_amount, p1.issue_amount, p1.refund_source, p1.repayment_time, p1.expiring_date, p1.plan_annual_yield, p1.status, p1.create_time, p1.product_name, p1.product_code, p1.product_type, p1.id, p1.factknot_time FROM tbl_product p1 WHERE p1.product_type = 1 and p1.status !=5 and p1.status !=11 ) p2 LEFT JOIN tbl_bill_product_relation r2 ON p2.id = r2.product_id LEFT JOIN tbl_bill_assets a2 ON r2.asset_id = a2.id LEFT JOIN tbl_push_party t2 ON a2.push_party_id = t2.id
UNION ALL -- 内部资产 SELECT a2.rate as creditor_rights_transfer_cost, a2.contract_num, a2.debtor_cus_num, a2.original_debtor, p2.new_or_old_type, t2.push_party_org_code AS push_party_code, a2.remark, p2.product_deadline, p2.value_date, p2.raise_start_date, p2.raise_end_date, p2.settle_amount, p2.issue_amount, p2.refund_source, p2.repayment_time, p2.expiring_date, NULL AS assets_interest, p2.plan_annual_yield, a2.new_deadline AS bill_remaining_days, a2.expiring_date AS bill_rate_due_date, NULL AS passive_id, p2.status, p2.create_time, p2.product_code, p2.product_type, p2.product_name, p2.id, a2.assets_code, a2.`status` as asset_status, p2.factknot_time -- 实际结标时间 FROM ( SELECT p1.new_or_old_type, p1.product_deadline, p1.value_date, p1.raise_start_date, p1.raise_end_date, p1.settle_amount, p1.issue_amount, p1.refund_source, p1.repayment_time, p1.expiring_date, p1.plan_annual_yield, p1.status, p1.create_time, p1.product_name, p1.product_code, p1.product_type, p1.id, p1.factknot_time FROM tbl_product p1 WHERE p1.product_type = 2 and p1.status !=5 and p1.status !=11 ) p2 LEFT JOIN tbl_factoring_product_relation r2 ON p2.id = r2.product_id LEFT JOIN tbl_factoring_asset a2 ON r2.asset_id = a2.id LEFT JOIN tbl_push_party t2 ON a2.push_party = t2.id ) al ORDER BY al.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (id, product_code, product_type, product_name, issue_amount, product_deadline, plan_annual_yield, raise_start_date, raise_end_date, start_bid_amount, increment_amount, extend_deadline, value_date, expiring_date, extend_expiring_date, nterest_mode, contract_template, plan_cash_day, interest_penalty_rate, status, settle_amount, product_desc, project_detail, refund_source, repayment_amount, factraise_time, factknot_time, repayment_time, create_time, modify_time, del_flag, ext, new_or_old_type, contract_url, continue_status, continue_amount, push_party_id, bill_type, bill_type_name ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planAnnualYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{raiseStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{raiseEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startBidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incrementAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extendDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{valueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extendExpiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nterestMode,jdbcType=BIT}, #{contractTemplate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{planCashDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{interestPenaltyRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundSource,jdbcType=BIT}, #{repaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factraiseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{factknotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newOrOldType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{contractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pushPartyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{billType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{billTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
product_code,

mapper.update:
update tbl_product
product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=BIT},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issue_amount = #{issueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
product_deadline = #{productDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_annual_yield = #{planAnnualYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
raise_start_date = #{raiseStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
raise_end_date = #{raiseEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_bid_amount = #{startBidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
increment_amount = #{incrementAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
extend_deadline = #{extendDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value_date = #{valueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiring_date = #{expiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
extend_expiring_date = #{extendExpiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nterest_mode = #{nterestMode,jdbcType=BIT},
contract_template = #{contractTemplate,jdbcType=BIT},
plan_cash_day = #{planCashDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
interest_penalty_rate = #{interestPenaltyRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
settle_amount = #{settleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_detail = #{projectDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_source = #{refundSource,jdbcType=BIT},
repayment_amount = #{repaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
factraise_time = #{factraiseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
factknot_time = #{factknotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repayment_time = #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_or_old_type = #{newOrOldType,jdbcType=BIT},
contract_url = #{contractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
continue_status = #{continueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
continue_amount = #{continueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
push_party_id = #{pushPartyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=BIT},
bill_type_name = #{billTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_product set product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=BIT}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issue_amount = #{issueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_deadline = #{productDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_annual_yield = #{planAnnualYield,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, raise_start_date = #{raiseStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, raise_end_date = #{raiseEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_bid_amount = #{startBidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, increment_amount = #{incrementAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extend_deadline = #{extendDeadline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value_date = #{valueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiring_date = #{expiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, extend_expiring_date = #{extendExpiringDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nterest_mode = #{nterestMode,jdbcType=BIT}, contract_template = #{contractTemplate,jdbcType=BIT}, plan_cash_day = #{planCashDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interest_penalty_rate = #{interestPenaltyRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settle_amount = #{settleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_detail = #{projectDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_source = #{refundSource,jdbcType=BIT}, repayment_amount = #{repaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, factraise_time = #{factraiseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, factknot_time = #{factknotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repayment_time = #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_or_old_type = #{newOrOldType,jdbcType=BIT}, contract_url = #{contractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continue_status = #{continueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continue_amount = #{continueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, push_party_id = #{pushPartyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=BIT}, bill_type_name = #{billTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
